void db2a(int debug2d[100][100],int n, int m)
{
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        for(int j = 1; j <= m; j++)
            cout << debug2d[i][j];
        cout << endl;
}
ll int dp[2005][2005];
int main()
{
    ll int n,m,sum,i,j,t;
    Sl(t);Sl(sum);
    t++;
    ll int ans = 0;
    while(t--){
        Sl(n);
        Sl(m);
        dp[0][0] = 1;
        for(i = 1; i <= n; i++){
            for (j = 1; j <= sum; j++){
                if(j >= m-1){
                    dp[i][j] = ((dp[i-1][j-1] + dp[i][j-1])%mod);
                    dp[i][j] =  (dp[i][j] - dp[i-1][j-m-1]+mod)%mod;
                }
                else {
                    dp[i][j] = (dp[i-1][j-1] + dp[i][j-1])%mod;
                }
            }
        }
        /*for (i = 1; i <= n; i++){
            for (j = 1; j <= sum; j++){
                cout << dp[i][j]<<" ";
            }
            cout << endl;
        }*/
        ans = (ans + dp[n][sum])%mod;
    }
    Pl(ans);
}
